edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.game.models

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel<Game>
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.game.models.GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractModelObserver, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel<Game>

    public class GameModel
extends javax.swing.AbstractListModel<Game>
implements AbstractModelObserver
    A singleton model for all for the Game data on the server. This Model should always reflect the data stored on the database and be updated whenever the model requires updating
    Author:
    dstapply jonathanleitschuh
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

      • addGames

        public void addGames(Game[] newGames)
        Adds all of the list of games to the model Used by the database controller construct the game model initially.
        Parameters:
        newGames - The games to be added to the model

      • updateGames

        public void updateGames(Game[] allGames)
        Updates the list of games in the model. If the there is any matching UUID's between the model and the list of games the values for the games will be updated using the server's values.
        Parameters:
        allGames - the list of games already in the model

      • update

        public void update(ObservableModel o,
          java.lang.Object arg)
        This method is called whenever any of the models game objects is changed. An application calls an Observable object's notifyObservers method to have all the object's observers notified of the change.
        Specified by:
        update in interface AbstractModelObserver
        Parameters:
        o - the observable object.
        arg - an argument passed to the notifyObservers method.
